review: This movie could have been a good erotic suspense drama but the cast ruined everything. Lead actors were biggest disaster. Story was fine, shoot location was a good choice, somehow Arijit keeps us loving this movie but rest of the stars still needs to learn acting. Directions by Vivek Agnihotri is a real drawback of this perfectly written story.

This film was not up to the mark although it has a very promising story that could have been acted in a better way.. with higher paid actors, but the collection of songs is the only thing that made the movie an overall must watch. You'll not be extremely satisfied after watching it or you may not even continue watching after a time, but the songs will definitely hold your mind for a long time afterwards..

I feel like Zid had the potential to become one of the best erotic/suspense/murder mystery thrillers if it had got better actors. Too many plot holes ruined it but whoever the writer(s) was, they had a really good idea. Not bad.

"ZID" is an average movie. It's not to be an excellent movie but for 1time to watch this it's ok. These movie had the 3 awesome songs, in this movie i love those songs, specially "tu zaaruri" song i am listening every day...

Very nice & gripping story with many twists & turns  with an unusual suspense...superb thriller with not so welknown actors but acted well,especially manara chopra acted veey nice with many hot scenes ...must watch movie for thriller mystery suspense movie lovers !

Movie was good song are very nice but the end was not good the badger manara who wants karan so much does not get his love she dies  what she has received even after so much love while the real culprits are karan and shraddha manara is poor innocent😢😢😢
First half of the movie wa slow but, after interval it moves faster. The movie have a nice plot, a excellent story.
I think the movie was good but I think it will be better if they do zid 2. With Maya back with a new hero and punish the evils - Robbie and Priya.
The ending made me quiet disappointed as maya had to die with lot hatred whereas she was so innocent while all she did was 'love'
Only highlight is Arijit Singh's song 'Sanson Ko Jeene ka' Excellent music.
The movie is excellent but it's an "only one-time watch" kinda movie. I enjoyed it.
